sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Text , StyleSheet , View , ScrollView , TextInput ,TouchableOpacity} from 'react-native'

const App = () => {
  return (
   <View style={Styles.container}>

     {/* heading */}
     
     <Text>Belajar Membuat aplikasi sederhana</Text>
      <View style={Styles.underline}></View>

    {/* Bagian Content*/}

      <View style={Styles.Content}>
        <View style={Styles.contentItem}>
          <Text >Menu 1 </Text>
        </View>

        <View style={Styles.contentItem}>
          <Text >Menu 2 </Text>
        </View>

        <View style={Styles.contentItem}>
          <Text >Menu 3 </Text>
        </View>
        
      </View>
     
   </View>
  )
}


const Styles = StyleSheet.create({
  container : {
    paddingLeft : '50px' ,
    paddingRight : '50px' ,
    paddingTop : '30px' ,
    textAlign : 'center' ,
    fontSize : '20px' ,
    fontWeight : 'bold' 
  } ,
  underline : {
    marginTop : '30px' ,
    height : '2px' ,
    backgroundColor : 'black'
  } ,
  Content : {
    marginTop : '20px' ,
    display : 'flex' ,
    flexDirection : 'row' ,
    flexWrap : 'wrap' ,
    justifyContent : 'space-between' ,
    height : '80px' 
  } ,

  contentItem : {
    margin : '5px' ,
    
    textAlign : 'center' ,
    paddingTop : '30px' ,
    borderRadius : '15px' ,
    flexGrow : '1' ,
    shadowColor : '#000' ,
    shadowOffset : {
      width : 0 ,
      height : 2
    } ,
    shadowOpacity : 0.4 ,
    shadowRadius : 5,
    elevation : 8 
  }
})

export default App
